Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Kidney Diseases/Nephritis/Nephritis, Interstitial
Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Urinary System Disorder/Renal Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Renal Disorder/Nephritis/Interstitial Nephritis
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Inflammation of the interstitial tissue of the kidney. This term is generally used for primary inflammation of KIDNEY TUBULES and/or surrounding interstitium. For primary inflammation of glomerular interstitium, see GLOMERULONEPHRITIS. Infiltration of the inflammatory cells into the interstitial compartment results in EDEMA, increased spaces between the tubules, and tubular renal dysfunction.
